name: GridAlignment
shortdesc: Alignment options for frame grids or baseline grids.

property.name: NONE
property.shortdesc: Lines are not aligned to the grid.

property.name: ALIGN_BASELINE
property.shortdesc: Aligns the text baseline to the grid.

property.name: ALIGN_EM_TOP
property.shortdesc: Aligns the top of the em box to the grid.

property.name: ALIGN_EM_CENTER
property.shortdesc: Aligns the center of the em box to the grid.

property.name: ALIGN_EM_BOTTOM
property.shortdesc: Aligns the bottom of the em box to the grid.

property.name: ALIGN_ICF_TOP
property.shortdesc: Aligns the top of the ICF box to the grid.

property.name: ALIGN_ICF_BOTTOM
property.shortdesc: Aligns the bottom of the ICF box to the grid.
